name: Firey's Candy Bar Adventure Remade (A BFDI game.)
name_original: Firey's Candy Bar Adventure Remade (A BFDI game.)
description:
Welcome to my remake of Firey's Candy Bar Adventure (Remake of unfinished 2009 build). It is a restoration that puts it into HTML5!
